Create a new project in your Android Studio and name it as TicTacToe .
Go to your browser and download the images for the tic tac toe game. Mainly you have to download three images for it, O , X and the image for the grid.
Now go to the activity_main.xml file in your project and click on the TextView and change the text inside that text view from “Hello world” to “Welcome to Tic Tac Toe

Now set the margin of 23dp from the top or as per your requirment.Now change the text size to 36 sp and text style to bold. You can visit all these properties by clicking on the widget and you can search for the required property in the search bar.

Now there will be a warning next to the TextView in the component tree which says “Hardcoded string ‘welcome to tic tac toe’ should use @string resource”. It is just a warning, it will not affect the app but if you want to remove that warning than you have to add the string in the strings.xml file inside app > res > value > strings.xml and than click on Open Editor and click on ‘+ ’ sign and than add the id and string . And after add adding the resource go to the text attribute of the TextView and click the oval shape symbol next to the column of the text attribute and you can pick the resource from there and your warning will be gone.

Now copy the downloaded images of X , O and grid to the drawable folder and drawable v 24 folder of your project . It is mandatory to copy the images in both the folder. If you copy the images only in the drawable folder than there are high chances that your app may crash.Now drag and drop a ImageView to your screen and do the constraints and than insert grid image in that ImageView.

Now define a method “playerTap”which will be executed when the user taps on the particular column of the grid. First, mention method “playerTop” in the activity_main.xml file in onClick attribute of all the ImageViews. After that write the method body in the MainActivity.java file .

Define an integer variable “activePlayer” and initialise it to ‘0’. This variable tells that which Player’s chance is there. If active player value is 0 than its X image will be displayed within that grid and if its value is 1 than O image will be displayed. int activePlayer = 0;

We have also assign a boolean data type named gameActive whose value will be true and when any player won we will set this data type to false. And when the gameActive will be false our reset method will be invoked and the grid will be reset.
